metadata.title: CVE-2024-47665 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i3c: mipi-i3c-hci: Error out instead on BUG_ON() in IBI DMA setupDefinitely condition dma_get_cache_alignment * defined value > 256during driver initialization is not reason to BUG_ON(). Turn that tograceful error out with -EINVAL.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
